card.name: Karn Liberated
card.property: +4: Target player exiles a card from their hand. −3: Exile target permanent. −14: Restart the game, leaving in exile all non-Aura permanent cards exiled with Karn Liberated. Then put those cards onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Alabaster Mage
card.property: {1} {W}: Target creature you control gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We hold sacred the powers of light and life. Truth and honor are our greatest weapons."—Alabaster creed

card.name: Ancestral Blade
card.property: When Ancestral Blade enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token, then attach Ancestral Blade to it. Equipped creature gets +1/+1. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Angel of the Dawn
card.property: Flying When Angel of the Dawn enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn. (Attacking doesn't cause them to tap.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She sings for all those who have been silenced.

card.name: Archangel of Thune
card.property: Flying Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.) Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Auriok Salvagers
card.property: {1} {W}: Return target artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Memnarch or the vedalken salvage most of the large machines, leaving us only scraps. Scraps are enough."

card.name: Austere Command
card.property: Choose two — • Destroy all artifacts. • Destroy all enchantments. • Destroy all creatures with converted mana cost 3 or less. • Destroy all creatures with converted mana cost 4 or greater.

card.name: Avacyn, Angel of Hope
card.property: Flying, vigilance, indestructible Other permanents you control have indestructible.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A golden helix streaked skyward from the Helvault. A thunderous explosion shattered the silver monolith and Avacyn emerged, free from her prison at last.

card.name: Blade Splicer
card.property: When Blade Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token. Golem creatures you control have first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Flesh is a betrayal of the self."

card.name: Boon Reflection
card.property: If you would gain life, you gain twice that much life instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Twice brewed and twice blessed, the remedy restores both body and mind.

card.name: Council's Judgment
card.property: Will of the council — Starting with you, each player votes for a nonland permanent you don't control. Exile each permanent with the most votes or tied for most votes.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When its power is threatened, the council speaks with a unified voice.

card.name: Crib Swap
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Exile target creature. Its controller creates a 1/1 colorless Shapeshifter creature token with changeling.

card.name: Crusader of Odric
card.property: Crusader of Odric's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are Odric's sword. We strike without fear, for his mind has divined how our foe will be slain."

card.name: Ethersworn Canonist
card.property: Each player who has cast a nonartifact spell this turn can't cast additional nonartifact spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The noble work of our order is to infuse all life on Esper with etherium. Our goal will be reached more rapidly if new life is . . . suppressed."

card.name: Fencing Ace
card.property: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His prowess gives the guildless hope that they can hold out against tyranny.

card.name: Flickerwisp
card.property: Flying When Flickerwisp enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its wings disturb more than air.

card.name: Fortify
card.property: Choose one — • Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. • Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Where metal is tainted and wood is scarce, we are best armed by faith."—Tavalus, acolyte of Korlis

card.name: Glint-Sleeve Artisan
card.property: Fabricate 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.)

card.name: Kemba, Kha Regent
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 2/2 white Cat creature token for each Equipment attached to Kemba, Kha Regent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am not Raksha. I never will be. But I refuse to be the kha who watched her pride be torn asunder."

card.name: Land Tax
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Leonin Abunas
card.property: Artifacts you control have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only leonin clerics who can survive the Razor Fields for one turning of the suns can stand in the Cave of Light.

card.name: Master Splicer
card.property: When Master Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token. Golems you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Phyrexian artificers remove the flesh they no longer need and use it to bring their unholy creations to a greater semblance of life.

card.name: Myrsmith
card.property: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Auriok see the artificer as a conduit, beckoning new creations into the world.

card.name: Open the Vaults
card.property: Return all artifact and enchantment cards from all graveyards to the battlefield under their owners' control. (Auras with nothing to enchant remain in graveyards.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the vaults are empty, everyone is rich.

card.name: Path to Exile
card.property: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle their library.

card.name: Puresteel Paladin
card.property: Whenever an Equipment enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card. Metalcraft — Equipment you control have equip {0} as long as you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: Remember the Fallen
card.property: Choose one or both — • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. • Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the Mirrans had fallen, Planeswalkers carried the burden of remembrance.

card.name: Revoke Existence
card.property: Exile target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The time has come for us to throw off the chains of tyrannical gods and antiquated superstitions."—Tikaia, disciple of Uremides

card.name: Sanctum Gargoyle
card.property: Flying When Sanctum Gargoyle enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As their supplies of etherium dwindled, mechanists sent gargoyles farther and farther afield in search of salvage.

card.name: Sanctum Spirit
card.property: Lifelink Discard a historic card: Sanctum Spirit gains indestructible until end of turn. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When history becomes too mournful, even good souls may choose to forget."—Shalai, voice of Plenty

card.name: Stoneforge Mystic
card.property: When Stoneforge Mystic enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. {1}{W}, {T}: You may put an Equipment card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Stonehewer Giant
card.property: Vigilance {1}{W}, {T}: Search your library for an Equipment card and put it onto the battlefield. Attach it to a creature you control. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No matter how strong, an unarmed fighter is no more than a fool."

card.name: Strength of Arms
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If you control an Equipment, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We fight not for Avacyn, but for her ideals; not for the church, but for its people."—Thalia, Guardian of Thraben

card.name: Tempered Steel
card.property: Artifact creatures you control get +2/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Death shall prevail as long as our will falls to rust. May necessity anneal our resolve."—Ghalma the Shaper

card.name: Thraben Inspector
card.property: When Thraben Inspector enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you've been at this as long as I have, nothing can surprise you. That's the hope, at least."

card.name: Topple the Statue
card.property: Tap target permanent. If it's an artifact, destroy it. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bolas cared little when his statue fell, thinking it a useful distraction, underestimating the surge of resolve it gave his opponents.

card.name: Valor in Akros
card.property: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's no stronger armor than the bravery of those beside you.

card.name: Valorous Stance
card.property: Choose one — • Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. • Destroy target creature with toughness 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every choice alters the path of fate."—Sarkhan Vol

card.name: Wrath of God
card.property: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Arcum Dagsson
card.property: {T}: Target artifact creature's controller sacrifices it. That player may search their library for a noncreature artifact card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Artifice sundered the world. It shall not again wreak such sorrow."

card.name: Argivian Restoration
card.property: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Argivian University taught me two things: always look to the past, and never dismiss what appears useless."—Hanna, *Weatherlight* navigator

card.name: Braids, Conjurer Adept
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may put an artifact, creature, or land card from their hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rifted multiverse became a sea of conflicting realities, each peopled by possible versions of every living being.

card.name: Brainstorm
card.property: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mizzium-sphere array drove her mind deep into the thought field, where only the rarest motes of genius may be plucked.

card.name: Cloudreader Sphinx
card.property: Flying When Cloudreader Sphinx enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Corridor Monitor
card.property: When Corridor Monitor enters the battlefield, untap target artifact or creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Castle Vantress has no locks on its doors, but interlopers rarely make it past the foyer.

card.name: Cyclonic Rift
card.property: Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand. Overload {6}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet specialize in unnatural disaster.

card.name: Deepglow Skate
card.property: When Deepglow Skate enters the battlefield, double the number of each kind of counter on any number of target permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its graceful glide paints the ocean floor with strokes of luminescence.

card.name: Esperzoa
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, return an artifact you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The more metal it digests, the more its jelly will fetch on the alchemists' market.

card.name: Faerie Mechanist
card.property: Flying When Faerie Mechanist enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Force of Will
card.property: You may pay 1 life and exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Counter target spell.

card.name: Frogify
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature loses all abilities and is a blue Frog creature with base power and toughness 1/1. (It loses all other card types and creature types.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: That gnat was still hovering by the venison, and now both looked delicious.

card.name: Grand Architect
card.property: Other blue creatures you control get +1/+1. {U}: Target artifact creature becomes blue until end of turn. Tap an untapped blue creature you control: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.

card.name: Hinder
card.property: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put that card on the top or bottom of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not react to force in kind. Turn it aside. Direct it to where it can do no harm."—Meloku the Clouded Mirror

card.name: Inkwell Leviathan
card.property: Trample Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Into its maw went the seventh sea, never to be seen again while the world remains."—Esper fable

card.name: Jace, the Mind Sculptor
card.property: +2: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library. 0: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order. −1: Return target creature to its owner's hand. −12: Exile all cards from target player's library, then that player shuffles their hand into their library.

card.name: Master of Etherium
card.property: Master of Etherium's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control. Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only a mind unfettered with the concerns of the flesh can see the world as it truly is."

card.name: Master Transmuter
card.property: {U}, {T}, Return an artifact you control to its owner's hand: You may put an artifact card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wasted potential surrounds us. Lend me that bauble, and let me see what it can be made to be."

card.name: Metallic Rebuke
card.property: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Too little, too late. The machine is in motion."—Tezzeret

card.name: Parasitic Strix
card.property: Flying When Parasitic Strix enters the battlefield, if you control a black permanent, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After finding no sustenance on the edges of Grixis, it turned to the skies of Bant.

card.name: Phyrexian Metamorph
card.property: ({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.) You may have Phyrexian Metamorph enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact or creature on the battlefield, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

card.name: Pongify
card.property: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Ape creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some spellcrafting mistakes go on to become spells of their own.

card.name: Relic Runner
card.property: Relic Runner can't be blocked if you've cast a historic spell this turn. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her knack for tampering with wards got her kicked out of the academy, but they also got her back in.

card.name: Reshape
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact. Search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost X or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Riddlesmith
card.property: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Neurok see the artificer as an archaeologist, clearing away falsehoods to see the truth hidden beneath.

card.name: Rush of Knowledge
card.property: Draw cards equal to the highest converted mana cost among permanents you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Limitless power is glorious until you gain limitless understanding."—Ixidor, reality sculptor

card.name: Sentinel of the Pearl Trident
card.property: Flash When Sentinel of the Pearl Trident enters the battlefield, you may exile target historic permanent you control. If you do, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

card.name: Serra Sphinx
card.property: Flying, vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sphinxes drink from the mystic meres of Serra's realm, where their keen eyes watch reflections of what is and what is yet to come.

card.name: Sift
card.property: Draw three cards, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dwell longest on the thoughts that shine brightest.

card.name: Steel Sabotage
card.property: Choose one — • Counter target artifact spell. • Return target artifact to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You are hopelessly obsolete, my brothers. Come and join the Great Work."—Rhmir, Hand of the Augur

card.name: Thirst for Knowledge
card.property: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lymph, the fluid essence of blinkmoths, is prized by wizards for the rush of intellect it provides.

card.name: Thought Reflection
card.property: If you would draw a card, draw two cards instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only when two oracles speak in unison is an omen accepted as truth.

card.name: Treasure Mage
card.property: When Treasure Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Vedalken Infuser
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All plans begin as dreams. I intend to awaken them."

card.name: Well of Ideas
card.property: When Well of Ideas enters the battlefield, draw two cards. At the beginning of each other player's draw step, that player draws an additional card. At the beginning of your draw step, draw two additional cards.

card.name: Ad Nauseam
card.property: Reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost. You may repeat this process any number of times.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the task spilled over into undeath, he stopped calling it his life's work.

card.name: Beacon of Unrest
card.property: Put target artifact or creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Shuffle Beacon of Unrest into its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The light of my master's guidance traverses all boundaries, even those separating life and death."

card.name: Bone Picker
card.property: This spell costs {3} less to cast if a creature died this turn. Flying, deathtouch

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They are the first to greet dissenters on their journey into exile.

card.name: Cast Down
card.property: Destroy target nonlegendary creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your life is finished, your name lost, and your work forgotten. It is as though Mazeura never existed."—*Chainer's Torment*

card.name: Costly Plunder
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature. Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No lock of iron is a match for Vraska's will of stone.

card.name: Dark Confidant
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.

card.name: Death's Shadow
card.property: Death's Shadow gets -X/-X, where X is your life total.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The shadow of the candle looms tall even as its light grows dim.

card.name: Defiant Salvager
card.property: Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Defiant Salvager. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I didn't survive that crash just so I could fall to the likes of you."

card.name: Dire Fleet Hoarder
card.property: When Dire Fleet Hoarder dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Among the pirates of the Brazen Coalition, the only thing more dangerous than failure is success.

card.name: Disciple of Bolas
card.property: When Disciple of Bolas enters the battlefield, sacrifice another creature. You gain X life and draw X cards, where X is that creature's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lord Bolas has shown me how each miserable little life holds untold resources."

card.name: Disciple of the Vault
card.property: Whenever an artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may have target opponent lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He stands in the shadow of his lord, Geth, drinking in the dark energies of the Vault.

card.name: Divest
card.property: Target player reveals their hand. You choose an artifact or creature card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Flittersprites collect unusually valuable things: coins of fallen empires, baby teeth, and memories of treasured names.

card.name: Doomed Necromancer
card.property: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice Doomed Necromancer: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many necromancers share the same last words—the ones that conclude the undeath ritual.

card.name: Dread Return
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Flashback—Sacrifice three creatures. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who forget the horrors of the past are doomed to re-meet them.

card.name: Driver of the Dead
card.property: When Driver of the Dead dies, return target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some vampires resorted to corpse trading after cathars burned their estates and drove them from their ancestral feeding grounds.

card.name: Drown in Sorrow
card.property: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sad truth is that the whip of Erebos is long enough to wrap around all our throats."—Perisophia the philosopher

card.name: Executioner's Capsule
card.property: {1} {B}, {T}, Sacrifice Executioner's Capsule: Destroy target nonblack creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is always a moment of trepidation before opening a message capsule, for fear of the judgment that might be contained within.

card.name: Fatal Push
card.property: Destroy target creature if it has converted mana cost 2 or less. Revolt — Destroy that creature if it has converted mana cost 4 or less instead if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

card.name: Geth, Lord of the Vault
card.property: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) {X}{B}: Put target artifact or creature card with converted mana cost X from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control tapped. Then that player mills X cards.

card.name: Glaze Fiend
card.property: Flying Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Glaze Fiend gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before the zealots of the Ethersworn came to power, Esper illusionists dreamed up creations to mimic a variety of substances.

card.name: Heartless Pillage
card.property: Target opponent discards two cards. Raid — If you attacked this turn, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Magus of the Abyss
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, destroy target nonartifact creature that player controls of their choice. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He climbs a staircase of falling souls, fighting the continuous pull of the void.

card.name: Magus of the Will
card.property: {2} {B}, {T}, Exile Magus of the Will: Until end of turn, you may play lands and cast spells from your graveyard. If a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, exile that card instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These eyes have shown me the flaws of flesh."

card.name: Morkrut Banshee
card.property: Morbid — When Morkrut Banshee enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let go your grudges, or risk wandering the bogs forever in a murderous rage."—Hildin, priest of Avacyn

card.name: Oubliette
card.property: When Oubliette enters the battlefield, exile target creature and all Auras attached to it. Note the number and kind of counters that were on that creature. When Oubliette leaves the battlefield, return that exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control tapped with the noted number and kind of counters on it. If you do, return the other exiled cards to the battlefield under their owner's control attached to that permanent.

card.name: Painsmith
card.property: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may have target creature get +2/+0 and gain deathtouch until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Moriok see the artificer as a taskmaster, forcing lazy metal into more potent shapes.

card.name: Ravenous Trap
card.property: If an opponent had three or more cards put into their graveyard from anywhere this turn, you may pay {0} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Exile all cards from target player's graveyard.

card.name: Salvage Titan
card.property: You may sacrifice three artifacts rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Exile three artifact cards from your graveyard: Return Salvage Titan from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Silumgar Scavenger
card.property: Flying Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.) Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Silumgar Scavenger. It gains haste until end of turn if it exploited that creature.

card.name: Skirsdag High Priest
card.property: Morbid — {T}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying. Activate this ability only if a creature died this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Thraben's pleas fall on deaf ears. Ours do not."

card.name: Skithiryx, the Blight Dragon
card.property: Flying Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) {B}: Skithiryx, the Blight Dragon gains haste until end of turn. {B}{B}: Regenerate Skithiryx.

card.name: Supernatural Stamina
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All are not equal—neither in life nor after death. Bontu's favorites will stand highest in eternity."—Senifet, vizier of Bontu

card.name: Thoughtseize
card.property: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Any dream is a robust harvest. Still, I prefer the timeworn dreams, heavy with import, that haunt the obsessive mind."

card.name: Twisted Abomination
card.property: {B}: Regenerate Twisted Abomination. Swampcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Vampire Hexmage

card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.

card.name: Fatal Push
card.property: Destroy target creature if it has converted mana cost 2 or less. Revolt — Destroy that creature if it has converted mana cost 4 or less instead if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

card.name: Thoughtseize
card.property: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.

card.name: Toxic Deluge
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay X life. All creatures get -X/-X until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Armor dissolved into flesh. Flesh melted to bone. Bone fell away to nothing.

card.name: Blood Moon
card.property: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bathed in deep crimson, the land that once gave comfort and shelter now yielded nothing but hostility.

card.name: Goblin Guide
card.property: Haste Whenever Goblin Guide attacks, defending player reveals the top card of their library. If it's a land card, that player puts it into their hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the landmarks themselves get up and move, goblin intuition beats any map.

card.name: Sneak Attack
card.property: {R}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice the creature at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Keep watch? Why? Nothing going to mess with us. We too big and scary."

card.name: Crop Rotation
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land. Search your library for a land card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The end of my cycle draws near. Rise up, young sprouts, and take root in my place."

card.name: Doubling Season
card.property: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead. If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

card.name: Exploration
card.property: You may play an additional land on each of your turns.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With every step she took, a new world unfolded before her.

card.name: Noble Hierarch
card.property: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In all her years of vigil, her resolve has never faltered.

card.name: Atraxa, Praetors' Voice
card.property: Flying, vigilance, deathtouch, lifelink At the beginning of your end step, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

card.name: Kaalia of the Vast
card.property: Flying Whenever Kaalia of the Vast attacks an opponent, you may put an Angel, Demon, or Dragon creature card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking that opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'll have my revenge if I have to call on every force from above and below."

card.name: Meddling Mage
card.property: As Meddling Mage enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card name. Spells with the chosen name can't be cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some defy the laws of nature. I dare nature to defy me."

card.name: Batterskull
card.property: Living weapon (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 black Germ creature token, then attach this to it.) Equipped creature gets +4/+4 and has vigilance and lifelink. {3}: Return Batterskull to its owner's hand. Equip {5}

card.name: Blightsteel Colossus
card.property: Trample, infect, indestructible If Blightsteel Colossus would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Blightsteel Colossus and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

card.name: Chrome Mox
card.property: Imprint — When Chrome Mox enters the battlefield, you may exile a nonartifact, nonland card from your hand. {T}: Add one mana of any of the exiled card's colors.

card.name: Expedition Map
card.property: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Expedition Map: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let's see. I've been here, here, here, here, and here. Where next?"—Olenn, tireless traveler

card.name: Lightning Greaves
card.property: Equipped creature has haste and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Equip {0}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After lightning struck the cliffs, the ore became iron, the iron became steel, and the steel became greaves. The lightning never left.

card.name: Mana Crypt
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you. {T}: Add {C}{C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At first they thought the vault was empty. Then the walls began to glow.

card.name: Mox Opal
card.property: Metalcraft — {T}: Add one mana of any color. Activate this ability only if you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What crossed her mind defied Orthodoxy: could there be perfection beyond *compleation*?

card.name: Sword of Body and Mind
Sword of Feast and Famine
Sword of Fire and Ice
Sword of Light and Shadow
Sword of War and Peace
Wurmcoil Engine
card.property: Deathtouch, lifelink When Wurmcoil Engine dies, create a 3/3 colorless Wurm artifact creature token with deathtouch and a 3/3 colorless Wurm artifact creature token with lifelink.

card.name: Academy Ruins
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}{U}, {T}: Put target artifact card from your graveyard on top of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Tolarian Academy was home to some of the greatest discoveries in Dominaria's history—as well as its greatest tragedies.

card.name: Urza's Mine
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Power-Plant and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In his hunger for power and knowledge, Urza dug deep into Dominaria's ancient past.

card.name: Urza's Power Plant
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza threw himself into his research, pushing the boundaries of both possibility and morality.

card.name: Urza's Tower
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Power-Plant, add {C}{C}{C} instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza studied the creations of the Thran not simply to learn from them, but to surpass them.

card.name: Wrath of God
card.property: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Chord of Calling
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost X or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
